concepts.name: configuration
concepts.description: The state of the naming process, containing the chemical structure and the building name string.

concepts.name: chemicalStructure
concepts.description: A representation of the organic molecule including atoms, bonds, and stereochemistry.

concepts.name: systematicName
concepts.description: The Preferred IUPAC Name (PIN) constructed by the process.

concepts.name: characteristicGroup
concepts.description: Functional groups attached to the parent compound.

concepts.name: principalCharacteristicGroup
concepts.description: The most senior characteristic group cited as a suffix.

concepts.name: parentCompound
concepts.description: The parent hydride (chain or ring) derived from the senior element and structure.

concepts.name: locant
concepts.description: Numbers or letters specifying position on the parent structure.

concepts.name: stereodescriptor
concepts.description: Descriptors such as R, S, E, Z, cis, trans used to specify configuration.

concepts.name: multiplicativePrefix
concepts.description: Prefixes like di, tri, tetra used when fragments occur multiple times.

concepts.name: unsaturationEnding
concepts.description: Endings such as 'en' or 'yn' denoting double or triple bonds.

assertions.name: validSystematicName
assertions.description: Asserts that the configuration contains a valid IUPAC Systematic Name.

assertions.name: principalGroupStepComplete
assertions.description: Asserts that the principal characteristic group has been selected. Can be null if a molecule has no characteristic group.

assertions.name: seniorParentIdentified
assertions.description: Asserts that the senior parent hydride has been determined.

assertions.name: hydrideNamed
assertions.description: Asserts that the base name of the senior parent hydride (chain or ring) has been determined.

assertions.name: unsaturationSpecified
assertions.description: Asserts that double and triple bonds have been identified and the 'an' ending has been changed to 'en' or 'yn'.

assertions.name: parentNamed
assertions.description: Asserts that the parent hydride has been named and unsaturation (ene/yne) specified.

assertions.name: parentAndSuffixCombined
assertions.description: Asserts that the name of hte parent hydride has been combined with the suffix for the principal characteristic group.

assertions.name: substituentsAndLocantsAssigned
assertions.description: Asserts that the substituends, locants, multiplicative prefixes, and their ordering have been determined.
